document.full_text: the harsh logic of china's one-child policy is starting to unravel, and census data to be released on thursday may well stoke debate whether the aging nation should relax restrictions.
document.title: china risks getting old before it gets rich
lines_and_colors: the harsh logic of china's one-child policy is starting to unravel, and census data to be released on thursday may well stoke debate whether the aging nation should relax restrictions.
